content: I completely agree with you! it's important to have positive role models in the media, especially in music, where lyrics and messages can have a powerful impact on listeners. music that promotes self-love and acceptance can help people feel more comfortable in their own skin, encourage them to treat themselves and others with kindness and respect, and contribute to a more positive and inclusive society overall. music artists who use their platform to promote these values are not only inspiring but can also cultivate a more positive and accessible culture for all.
